channel.title: Weather effects?
channel.description: Maybe some nights it could be raining or thundering. Sometimes it could be foggy or cloudy? It wouldn't have an impact on the game, I guess it would just be for visuals if you guys ever need any.

item.title: Weather effects?
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
According to concept art what is showing castle of Adiart around in underground cavern with sunshine reflecting on the castle’s exterior that has opening on the surface below.

Yeah that seemed possible with weather effects taking place

Read full topic

item.title: Weather effects?
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
We like to try to immerse people as much as possible in our game (that’s why we made it 3D, too) – this is definitely something to consider adding into a beta+ build to help build that sense of immersion~ cheers for the suggestion

Read full topic
